questions.question_text: What is the purpose of the sidebar feature in CSM Configurable Workspace?

choices.A: Enables agents to keep information regarding details of the case visible at all times
choices.B: Enables agents to access response templates to help them resolve cases faster and more efficiently
choices.C: To enable agents to collaborate with other agents or Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) in real-time for faster case resolution
choices.D: Enables managers to discreetly monitor chats between agents and customers

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-servicenow-platform/page/administer/conversational-interfaces/concept/exploring-sidebar.html

Selected Answer: C
"Sidebar enables agents so they can collaborate with others when working on a Workspace task-based or interaction-based record." 
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-servicenow-platform/page/administer/conversational-interfaces/concept/sidebar-landing.html

Selected Answer: C
C is Correct.
https://www.servicenow.com/community/csm-blog/for-csm-configurable-workspace-how-to-remove-the-contextual-side/ba-p/2290596

Selected Answer: C
C correct

Selected Answer: C
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-servicenow-platform/page/administer/conversational-interfaces/concept/sidebar-overview.html
